hero.title: Prayer
hero.subtitle: "God will provide." — With those two words, San José Gregorio summed up his entire philosophy of life. Here you will find the prayers to ask for his intercession.

prayers.title: Official prayer (post-canonization)
prayers.text:
Good Father,
through the intercession of San José Gregorio Hernández,
we ask that You grant us health of body and soul
so that we may be witnesses of faith, hope, and charity,
committed to building a world
where Your truth, justice, and peace may reign.
Through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.

prayers.title: Prayer of the cause
prayers.text:
Lord Jesus Christ,
You who instilled in Your servant José Gregorio
steadfastness in virtue,
purity in his actions,
a great love for You,
for Your Most Holy Mother and for his neighbor,
deign to glorify him before Your Church.

Grant that I, imitating his virtues,
may draw closer to You,
and through the merits of Your Passion and Death,
grant me the grace I ask of You...

(Make your petition in silence.)

Virgin of Coromoto, Patroness of Venezuela,
intercede for the glorification of your devotee
José Gregorio Hernández. Amen.

Our Father, Hail Mary, and Glory Be.

prayers.title: Prayer for the sick
prayers.text:
You, blessed servant of God,
hear my cries, listen to my pleas
and intercede before your Lord
for my swift recovery and my longed-for health.

Generous Dr. José Gregorio Hernández,
for your generosity with your patients,
I place my trust in you
that you may be a faithful intermediary
before our God, Our Lord,
your confidant and friend.

Do not abandon me.
I implore the Sacred Heart of Jesus and the Holy Spirit
to enlighten the doctors,
that they may correctly identify my illness
and find the medicines and treatments
appropriate to cure me.

To my Mother, the Virgin Mary, I plead,
that she give me strength to endure with courage and hope
all the discomforts of my illness
and thus redeem myself from all my faults
as my Lord Jesus suffered on the Cross.

Lord, I praise You and I bless You!
Glory to You, Lord!
I thank You for creating me, redeeming me, and making me a Christian.
Thank You, my Jesus. Thank You! Amen!

(State your petition, imploring the miraculous mediation of Dr. José Gregorio Hernández, and pray three Our Fathers, three Hail Marys, and three Glory Be's.)

prayers.title: Daily prayer
prayers.text:
O Lord my God, You who can do all things
and who have welcomed into Your bosom
Your beloved servant José Gregorio,
who by Your great mercy
You gave the power to heal the sick in this world,
grant him, Lord, the grace to heal me,
as a spiritual physician,
my soul and my body
if it be for Your glory.

I ask this of You, Lord my God,
in the name of Your beloved Son
who taught us to pray saying:
Our Father...

prayers.title: Prayer for the youth of Ecuador
prayers.text:
O Most Holy Trinity, God, one in essence and three in persons,
grant to the children and youth of Ecuador,
as You granted to José Gregorio Hernández from his tender years,
the grace to love You above all things
and to love their neighbor solely for Your love;
keep far from their minds and hearts
error, falsehood, deceit, selfishness,
hatred, unhealthy envy,
and the crude materialism that is causing so much harm to youth.

Grant that our professionals may constantly keep in their minds
the example of José Gregorio, who devoted all his knowledge
and his life to the service of his neighbors,
especially the poor, the sick
lacking financial resources, and all those in need.

Have mercy, Lord, on us
and hear my humble prayer
and the intercession of Your Servant
José Gregorio Hernández Cisneros,
Doctor of the Poor,
and grant me the grace I ask of You in this prayer.
Amen.

prayers.title: Healing prayer (Ecuadorian version)
prayers.text:
Holy Spirit, Dr. José Gregorio Hernández,
spiritual physician, I invoke you and implore you
to hear my pleas
for the health of (person's name),
that they may recover soon from their illness,
even if little by little.

If this be so, I shall be wholly grateful to you
and I will give a small alms
to the person who most needs it
and I will help your church
even with the little I possess,
where we venerate you in Ecuador eternally.
Amen.

(Also pray one Our Father, one Hail Mary, and one Glory Be.)

novena.title: Novena to San José Gregorio Hernández
novena.intro: The complete novena consists of nine days of meditations addressing the Holy Trinity, the Eucharist, the Passion of Christ, repentance, the five wounds of Christ, and the Blessed Virgin Mary.
novena.openingPrayer:
O Most Loving Trinity!:
In You I believe, in You I hope,
and I love You with all my heart.
I ask that You fill my soul with Your grace
and keep me always in Your friendship.

Lord God, Almighty King!:
In Your hands all things are placed.
If You wish to save Your people
there is none who can resist Your will...

We adore You and bless You
for the extraordinary graces You granted
to Your Servant José Gregorio,
especially for that of loving You
above all things
and loving his neighbor as himself...

Deign, Most Merciful Trinity,
to hear Your Servant,
granting us the favor we ask
if it be for Your greater glory and the good of our souls.
We ask this through the merits of Jesus Christ Our Lord.
Amen.

days.theme: God the Almighty Father — Praise and supplication
The Divine Word — The Eucharist and Communion
The Passion of Christ — The prophecies of the Prophet
The five wounds of Christ — The humanity and charity of JGH
The Holy Spirit — The gifts bestowed upon JGH
The Blessed Virgin Mary — The Magnificat
God the Protecting Father — Help for the poor
God the Redeeming Father — Final intercession

items.text: Most of these people have no means; I will not deny them a consultation, and I will not make them go through the embarrassment of telling me they have no money. God will provide.
I must go back to my town. In Isnotú there are no doctors, and my place is there, where one day my own mother asked me to return to relieve the suffering of the humble people of our land.
There is an infinitely powerful and wise being, creator of the admirably ordered universe we know. This being we call God.
Good can only come from truth, never from error. Error is the poison of the intellect.
In man, duty is the reason for rights, so that man has duties before he has rights.
If in the world there are good people and bad, the bad are so because they made themselves bad; but the good are not so except with the help of God.
My mother taught me virtue from the cradle, raised me in the knowledge of God, and gave me charity as my guide.
A true man holds as his moral ideal to do good.

hymn.title: Hymn to San José Gregorio Hernández
hymn.description: The official beatification hymn, titled 'Siervo Digno y Bueno' (Worthy and Good Servant), was composed by Richard López with arrangements by Miguel Teixeira of the Music Ministry of the Basilica of Santa Teresa in Caracas.
hymn.chorus:
José Gregorio Hernández
gives peace and comfort
to all who suffer,
health to the sick,
and may I too,
following your example,
offer to the Father
all that I have.
Worthy and good servant.
hymn.listenNote: The complete hymn can be found on digital platforms (Spotify, YouTube) by searching for 'Himno al Doctor José Gregorio Hernández — MMBST.'
